Convolution::Convolution(
    cudnnDataType_t dataType, THVoidTensor* input, THVoidTensor* weight,
    THVoidTensor* bias, THVoidTensor* output, std::vector<int> pad,

  : idesc(), odesc(), odesc_bias(), bdesc(), wdesc(), cdesc(), groups(groups)

I thought this would be a good place to a) not pollute convolution.cpp with cudnn specific things and b) as the constructor is already doing input dim checks. (Unless I am misunderstanding something)

  : idesc(), odesc(), odesc_bias(), bdesc(), wdesc(), cdesc(), groups(groups)
